name: Disco Drop
description:
LMOB BEGGINER JAM #6: Theme of this weeks jam is 'One Button'. In this game your only tool is your parachute which you can release by pressing Space. 

Collect points by hitting the gold, platinum & diamond records & avoid the TNT at all costs. 

Set a high score by surviving for 1 minute, double points on hard mode but less control and more danger. 

Assets Used:

Audio:

https://freesound.org/people/jobro/sounds/35461/ by jobro

Background: 

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/dynamic-space-background-lite-104606 by DinV Studio

Fonts sourced from: 

https://www.fontsc.com/font/beon by Bastien Sozoo 

https://www.fontsc.com/font/monoton by by Vernon Adams
